column2: I'm not too big of a sandwich guy
column3: but this place hits the spot. With a hipster/modern interior
column4: the restaurant itself has a very nice vibe and feel to it. The portions are adequate for the price you pay
column5: as each sandwich comes with 2 sides. All the sides are healthy and delicious - my favorites include the quinoa
column7: and the cole slaw. Try them all though! Maybe even ask for some samples because they'd be more than willing to let you taste test them.
